text_by_page.3: Laws of reflection. Angle of incidence equals angle of reflection (i = r).
text_by_page.4: Refraction. Bending of light. Snell's law: sin i / sin r = constant.
text_by_page.5: Refractive index n = c/v. Frequency remains constant.
text_by_page.7: Total Internal Reflection. Critical angle. Denser to rarer.
text_by_page.12: Theories of light. Newton corpuscular. Huygens wave. Maxwell electromagnetic. Planck quantum.
text_by_page.15: Interference. Coherent sources. Constant phase difference.
text_by_page.16: Constructive interference path diff n lambda. Destructive (2n+1)lambda/2.
text_by_page.27: Diffraction. Bending around corners. Fresnel and Fraunhofer.
